title: SGC Graded T206s For Sale - Bresnahan, Stone, Howell
author: Beatles Guy

posts.post_title: SGC Graded T206s For Sale - Bresnahan, Stone, Howell
posts.post_content:
Up for sale are three T206s.  Backs are clean. Paypal Goods is the preferred method of payment. Shipping included. Please contact me via PM if interested.

Roger Bresnahan w/Bat (Pied 350, Fac. 25) - $115.00 - SOLD!
[URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/1910%20T206%20Roger%20Bresnahan%20With%20Bat_zpssrj0puut.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/1910%20T206%20Roger%20Bresnahan%20With%20Bat_zpssrj0puut.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

George Stone (SC 150, Fac. 30) - $45.00 - SOLD!
[URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/1909%20T206%20George%20Stone_zpse83refzd.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/1909%20T206%20George%20Stone_zpse83refzd.jpg[/IMG][/URL]

Harry Howell (Hands at Waist, Pied 460, Fac. 25) - $50.00
[URL=http://s606.photobucket.com/user/jalbregts/media/1911%20T206%20Harry%20Howell%20Hands%20At%20Waist_zpspuw37l8f.jpg.html][IMG]http://i606.photobucket.com/albums/tt148/jalbregts/1911%20T206%20Harry%20Howell%20Hands%20At%20Waist_zpspuw37l8f.jpg[/IMG][/URL]
Harry Howell is still looking for a new home.
